text: Nichola Thorp (born 30 September 1988/1989), also known as Nicola Sian, is an English actress. She is known for her portrayal of Nicola Rubinstein in long- running ITV soap opera, Coronation Street, from 2017 to 2019. Thorp was born and raised in Blackpool, the town of Lancashire, England. ==Other websites== * Category:1988 births Category:Living people Category:English television actors Category:People with borderline personality disorder Category:Actors from Blackpool
title: Nicola Thorp
